wikipedia_page.main: Franz Mandl (1923–2009) was a British theoretical physicist, known for his graduate-level textbooks.

response: Franz Mandl (4 August 1916 in Vienna – 4 February 1988) was an Austrian football (soccer) player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Austrian team, which won the silver medal in the football tournament. He played one match as forward and scored one goal.
